Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.label: proficiency: Adrenaline Rush
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.description: Land 30 killing blows while adrenaline rush is active.
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.extraTooltip: Completing this Beast Hunt unlocks the proficiency upgrade for this ability: Increase the duration by 5 seconds upon landing a killing blow.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.label: proficiency: Beast Howl
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.description: Stun targets 60 times with beast howl.
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.extraTooltip: Completing this Beast Hunt unlocks the proficiency upgrade for this ability: Temporarily slows all stunned targets.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.label: proficiency: Huntsman's Bounty
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.description: Kill 30 targets that have had a bounty placed on them by this lycanthrope.
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.extraTooltip: Completing this Beast Hunt unlocks the proficiency upgrade for the Huntsman's Bounty ability: Increase the gold reward to 25% of the targets combat power.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.label: proficiency: Huntsman's Mark
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.description: Kill 30 targets that have been marked by this lycanthrope.
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.extraTooltip: Completing this Beast Hunt unlocks the proficiency upgrade for this ability: Killing the marked target resets the cooldown.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.label: proficiency: Moon Veil
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.description: Use moon veil 30 times while in beast form.
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.extraTooltip: Completing this Beast Hunt unlocks the proficiency upgrade for this ability: Moon veil can be used regardless of the current lunar conditions.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.label: proficiency: Spectral Werewolf
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.description: Have your spectral werewolf land 30 killing blows.
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeBeastHuntDef.extraTooltip: Completing this Beast Hunt unlocks the proficiency upgrade for this ability: Summon an additional spectral werewolf.
